reviewText: Excellent!  Very current, has all the latest resorts, shows, and events. Very informative for  an out-of-town visitor, or resident as well. Especially enjoyed the 100 yr. history segment, it is a good momento of our  vacation in Las Vegas!

Great tape well worth the $.  The history section was very interesting, neat to see all the old hotels and motels before they were mega resorts. The implosions were unbelivable!  Could use more shots of  inside the rooms and more show clips otherwise the most current tape on Las  Vegas I have seen, had all of the new hotels even the new Paris.
